values:
am i worrying myself too much?
I haven't been able to sleep since the doctor gave me the news.
and those 4 words you never want to hear...came running towards me...

" we found a lump"

it can really only go downhill from here.....

...god, im only 20!

Fuck this

My grandma is on the verge of death and I don't know what to feel. Should I be feeling sad and depressed? I think i'm more angry then anything, angry that i have school and work and that i can't see her, angry that she forgets who i am on my birthday, angry that i didn't know her more...angry that she can't stay alive forever.

I haven't really told anyone much about what's going on with her, I kind of just keep it all bundled up inside, because if I talk about it i'll burst into tears. I told Deanna about it the other day, and I almost had a breakdown. I wish that she came to visit more often,I wish all of my dads family visited. Because I miss them...I miss being there. I miss Nessa...and I miss David...

There's something missing in my life, and I just can't figure any of it out. I don't know what to do with life anymore, with school with work. I just wanna spend my money all the time and get drunk. I can't even save up for fuck sakes!

I miss last summer and how i never had to think...its all a blur but I know it was safe. Furby street, the airplane road and monck avenue will never be the same.

Guess what I bought on ebay? Yesss my first purchase was a DATA cable and software cd for my phone?? What does that mean? Fuck yeah free ringtones, display pics and i can upload my cam pictures!!! YES i love visa!

EMPIRE EMPIRE EMPIRE, TOMORROW TOMORROW TOMORROW!!

So i bought my new shoes, my outfit and jewllery. i'm soooo pumped, i can't wait to party party party because before i know it i'll be sittin' in a wheel chair full of arthristis and other stuff.

Ew old age is on its way!

okay so i'm officially getting OLD. My bones hurt, I can't party as hard and i'm starting to mature. What the fuck is that?? It's very depressing. All I seem to wanna do is sleep, eat and go to the casino ( i swear i'm not a gambler!!) 

I'm really hoping that you all are making efforts to show up for my wonderful celebration at the Empire Cabaret. I know that some stupid party pooper who will remain nameless is not even making any efforts.

Julia: So are we still on for Saturday at the bar?
Me: Fuck yeah!!! We're partying all night
Julia: well..i can only stay until midnight because daniel has to do homework

HOMEWORK!!!! on a fucking saturday night at midnight? Fuck that's pathetic. I am soooo mad at her right now. Like it's my fucking 20th birthday fuck daniel, why do you have to be so submissive. Stand up for yourself you fucking jesus freak!! Arghhh


OOOh and Dorelle...guess who i saw walking around the mall?? That's right, no one other then the well known MATWYSHYN!!!!!!!!!! Ew EW he's all built and matcho looking now it's fricken disgusting i felt like running up to him and being like ' FUCK YOU!!'

Anyways back to learning.
Brandon brandon BRANDON!!! i can't wait for this weekend. Curling, waterslides, shauny and booze!!!!!! fucl ya this is gonna rock!!

MARCH 11

THE EMPIRE



MMMMMMYYYYYYYYYYY 20th BBBBBBBBB-DDDDDDAAAAYYYY!!!!!

fuck this, fuck the world. fuck off

Pour toi Don't Give Up And i'm sorry For tonight. I wasn't myself, i was on a high. And i'm dangling From thin strings Control me I am your doll Don't lose grip Just hold on I know life's hard and complicated But donn't give up If I never Hear from my friend again I"ll lose the pieces And unscramble all of them. I'll take a wide step Find you at 3 am) It's time to come back Because i'm singing Don't lose grip Just hold on I know life's hard and complicated But donn't give up

All around me are familiar faces
Worn out places, worn out faces

Bright and early for the daily races
Going nowhere, going nowhere

The tears are filling up their glasses
No expression, no expression

Hide my head I wanna drown my sorrow
No tomorrow, no tomorrow.

And I find it kinda funny,
I find it kinda sad.
The the dreams in which I'm dying,
Are the best I've ever had

I find it hard to tell you,
I find it hard to take
When people run in circles,
It's a very very...mad world, mad world!

Children waiting for the day they feel good
Happy birthday, happy birthday.

And I fear the way that every child should
Sit and listen, sit and listen

Went to school and I was very nervous
No one knew me, no one knew me

Hello teacher tell me what's my lesson
Look right through me, look right through me

And I find it kinda funny,
I find it kinda sad.
The the dreams in which I'm dying,
Are the best I've ever had

I find it hard to tell you,
I find it hard to take
When people run in circles,
It's a very very...mad world, mad world!
Enlargen your world, mad world!

My favourite high school teacher died yesterday afternoon of pancreatic cancer and i'm so devastated. It's been nothing but deaths this year and it's starting to really get to me lately. I've been trying to hold it all in and forget but its catching up. I'm sad and depressed...who will be next. I'm so scared....i dont think i've ever had such a depressing year in my life. I feel empty inside and sad...

What do I do with myself....


RIP Francis Desbiolles...you always kept your head up high and had such a strong character. I'll miss that.....

Weekend was fun. Drinking and rippers kind of make an odd combination for me but ashley is now legal and i am now going to introduce her to the wide-spread world of adulterism. I bought a few fish,
Just the other day.
I was so happy, and excited
That I wanted to party.

Then woke up the next day
And found the poor neon
On his back side. 
And so my dismay,
2 more went their separate way.

And now I am left with
10, and no more money to spend.
So tell me next time what i've done wrong
So you can spare me the tears
And the wasted cash.

I wake to hear your weeping cries,
When you told me what was wrong I wished it were lies,
You said the doctors had found a lump,
When I head this my heart went thump.
I buried my face back in the pillow,
Remembering all the good times we had,
Brought me to this state of feeling sad,
From shopping to garage sale hopping,
Our good times will never die,
Nothing about our relationship is a lie.
A tear drops slowly down my face,
I suddenly feel displaced,
The tear reaches my chin,
I think this is a battle I will not win,
Now my pillow is soaking wet,
I hope you'll pull through
This is what I bet

Sometimes, I don't know where it all started to go wrong. I used to be happy, I used to love to sing and dance and act and play music. I was a girl who always put others first and who never thought of herself. It was you before me, or them before I.

My parents sheltered me from the cold, from the evil that the life brings to us. They kept me safe in our little Norwood bungalo. I never thought anything bad would happen to my family, or friends because...I was Micheline...and God loved me.

Then it hit me...people around me were starting to get sick..I no longer lived in eternal safety. I was surround by people dieing, by friendships fallings apart and by failure. I thought to myself..."What do I have to live for?" And I realised, that I wasn't brought into the world for me to be happy and for me to live for me..I was hear to be brought up into to what others expected me to be. Everything had to be up to everyone elses standards. Nothing ever went perfect anymore. The one's in whom i looked up to the most were leaving me. I started to not believe in myself or in anyone else before.

What is going on with in my mind? I can't even understand it anymore, what was I ever thinking? Why was I so blind in thinking that nothing like that, or nothing like THIS would ever be happening to me. Why am I so sheltered? I need to grow up.

To Jessica...You were so talented, dedicated and aspiring. You taught me so many things, and whenever I pick up the instrument of love and compassion...I will always remember you, you're romantical fingers and your breath of wisdom.

To Lisa, you saw through others, you saw the magic in everyone. You never judged a soul, you never gave up. You were loved by me, by hundreds, by the world. And now that you are gone, I rest assured that you are in a better place. Watching down on me, knowing that I will get through this because you are my guardian angel..and I'll love you for eternity.


Won't somebody save me...because only in the water, am I beautiful.

RIP my Jessica. You will always be in my heart...forever and a day.

Site dedicated to her memory.


http://www.freewebs.com/inlovingmemoryofjb/guestbook.htm

This has been such a shitty day...and no one even understands....i'm feeling totally down and i'm sitting here...all alone. Seems like we're getting further and further....and it's been forever that we've been just "us two"

I can really see all the obstacle in my way...

i wish someone would spoil me :(

FUCK.

Okay so I just totally got hired on the spot at a really fun job! I'll be working at westpoint at the mall. It's a shoe boutique, it looks like fun. I'll be making commision AND be working with really nice girls! I'm so excited, plus the hours are awesome so yay!!!!!!

I guess my life isn't as shitty as I thought it was

Hurray for me

Oh and apparently Garett is really good friends with Mia's older brother Matt..hah! Small fucking world!

Peace

I start my radio gig today, at 8 am! Which is why i'm up so fricken early *yawn* and then after schools over i'm off to xentel! yipee..moolah moolah moolah mooollaaahhh. Everything is good and everybody's your friend! HAh


I'm nervous. Last night Shaun DID end up coming over and we had fun, carved some pumpkins, did a little this and that..and yeah....wow.

xoxoxo

So much for carving a pumpkin together...whatever, i should have expected it. I'm too demanding anyways...


wish you were here...

So today was cool, well it's not over yet. But so far it's been good! I took a nap, and I finally had some sleep. Which is good concidering that i haven't slept in days. Christalee sent me the slideshow that they made for lisa at her reception which i missed because i was way too upset to socialize with people. So I was glad to see that:) I woke up early this morning to go see my baby curl! Yay team shaun!! haha i met his family and friends and it was cool! I had fun, and it wasn't as boring as I thought curling was. I still don't understand half the game, but whatever. haha

Jessica is coming over soon and we are going to decorate my yard amazingly for halloween since I have made it my goal this year to have the coolest yard on my block! Way to go champs!! haha We are also going to carve pumpkins and eat seeds..MMmmmm i can't wait!!

Last night was alright, jess and I got drunk, stole pumpkins from a few yards and then I went home and locked myself in my room. Seems like i've been doing that quite often lately, I guess because of everything that happened.

I start my new job tomorrow, and i'm kind of nervous. I know it's going to be soo boring, but i don't care.I fucking love the idea of getting paid every week. It's going to be the coolest thing ever  *sings* " I'm in the money!"

I find out this week what stage my grandma's cancer is at. Hopefully they caught it on time and she won't have to go through Chemo or anything. I'm so scared for her..but she's so brave. She's such a tough lady and so was Lisa.

This past week has been so shitty. Patrick almost killed himself on a Quad going up a hill, thankfully all he had was a few bruised ribs. Evan's lung collapsed and he spent a few nights in the hospital. I found out about my grandma AND Lisa passed away. I guess it's not wonder that i've been so crabby and sensitive. So I appoligize to everyone who's had to deal with me recently. I know I haven't been the happiest person, but that's ok....i'm getting better. I'm on the road to recovery.'

I guess all I can say now is go check out our newly studio recorded SONG!!! AT purevolume. The addy is in my User Info. I'm not sure how to post a link so i'll just tell you to click on my website in my info!!! Actually it might even be on my template! I duno..but i'm telling you..it's totally worth it!! It's called Design my Spine! Yay for professional recordings!!!!!!!


Ciaos!

Everyone have a happy egging tonight!

Oh and I forgot to mention, we recorded a song in a PROFESSIONAL STUDIO on Friday. If you are interested in listen to the MP3...go to our website

Http://www.purevolume.com/everythingisforever

The song is called Design My Spine

Today was the hardest day of my life. Poor Roberta and Les. We got to the church at 10:30, just as Lisa's parents (roberta and les) we're arriving. It was soo hard to see her falling apart. She ran to me and took me in her arms and we cried on eachothers shoulders. I told her that I never knew...and she was so sorry and so vulnerable. I had never seen her like that...with such a broken heart.

The ceremony was beautiful, they captured her exactly like she was...such a beautiful and spontaneous person. It was her...100%. Apparently in the hospital she'd hit the nurses with wet face clothes and tell them about all her hot guy crushes. She always wanted to to wear bright colored hospital gowns and always looked out for others before herself.

The Vincent Massey Chamber Choir sang all the songs that she had picked. She planned her whole funeral, what a brave soul. 

Ken, Marian and Scott were there..they were about the only others ones there from Rainbow Stage. Poor Scott, i felt kinda bad for him because lisa always had a huge crush on him. She'd call me almost every week to tell me about him and how she saw him a musical, or at a competition. She'd talk about how she wanted to marry him and they'd buy a nice house together and own a pink ferrari. She had so many dreams, there was so much she could have still done with her life. She was for all of us, an inspirational person, someone full of energy, honesty and love. I'll miss her forever and I'll always be comforted by the thought that I have my own guardian angel up there. 

Lisa...if somehow you are watching me...I love you and i'm glad that you are in a better place. You suffered so much, you were so courageous...you'll forever be alive, in all our hearts.


XOXOXOX
Lisa Mitchelle....you'll always be remembered Lisa Mitchell

Lullabye (Goodnight, My Angel)
River Of Dreams Released: 1993 


Goodnight, my angel
Time to close your eyes
And save these questions for another day
I think I know what you've been asking me
I think you know what I've been trying to say
I promised I would never leave you
And you should always know
Wherever you may go
No matter where you are
I never will be far away 

Goodnight, my angel
Now it's time to sleep
And still so many things I want to say
Remember all the songs you sang for me
When we went sailing on an emerald bay
And like a boat out on the ocean
I'm rocking you to sleep
The water's dark
And deep inside this ancient heart
You'll always be a part of me 

Goodnight, my angel
Now it's time to dream
And dream how wonderful your life will be
Someday your child may cry
And if you sing this lullabye
Then in your heart
There will always be a part of me 

Someday we'll all be gone
But lullabyes go on and on...
They never die
That's how you
And I
Will be

Not only has this been the shitiest day of my entire life, but it's the SADDEST day. I just want to kill myself. I just found out like....24 hours ago that my grandma might have cancer and now about 20 minutes ago, christalee tells me that Lisa Mitchell ( a friend of the family, but mostly mine,for so many years) was diagnosed with cancer in september....and no one fucking told me. She was in the hospital for a month....and then they moved her to paliative care....and yesterday...she passed away.....
 
I can't believe this happened...I just saw her this summer, and she was so happy and I only got to see her a few times. I didn't even get to say goodbye in the fucking hospital, i didn't know she was sick..I didn't know. I loved her. She touched so many hearts, she did so much for others...even if she had down-syndrome......she still graduated from high school, worked hard, loved life and others...and she was everybody's best friend. I loved her sooooooo much!!!!!
 
I'll miss you so much...you'll always be in my heart, my lisa....
 

Goodnight my angel...

So remember, when I almost got my van towed in front of Ragpickers that one time??? WELL, apparently they ALSO gave me a ticket..which was NEVER on my car, so i don't know how it got there..all I know is that the bitchy chick tried to tow my car! She never said anything about a ticket or anything...FUCK..so today in the mail, i receive a notice saying that I need to pay $70 for a fucking parking ticket that wasn't paid from last year, WTF!?! I am sooo fucking pissed...not only that...BUT i dropped my brandnew cellphone down the stairs today. ARghh what a bad day..i'm sooo upset!!!

Went for sushi last night, how fabolous it was. The sushi was actually bit size, which means...no funny faces or chocking while eating! The rice was actually soft and warm and the seaweed was edible! MMM yummmmm. I had fun, we talked about stuff...and yeah it had been awhile and it was fun.

Jess is now dragging me out to the u of w to visit her girlfriend, or ex..or something dramatic like that. Oiiii! I hope i don't see people I know, because i'll feel like killing them. I'm just in a very hormonal mood, ya know how it is.

OMG LOUISE DIED ON PASSIONS!! FUCK THAT SUCKS...all those years of having a major crush on him! shit shit!! that's fucked up!

Shaun went to look for the treasure yesterday, i thought it was pretty humurous..too bad they didn't find anything, would have been cool. I still think he should keep on lookin'.

Oh and by the way, i got my new friggin' PHONE!! YEAAHHH

I officially hate school..yes that's write. today i wrote my first mid-term of the year..and you know what?! My fucking brain is too damn sick to even function..so i probably did terrible..i'm sure it didn't help non the less that I had no fricken sleep last night!! I hate having a stuffy nose, gross flem coming out of my lungs and a terrible cough. Those three just don't mix together. All I wanna do right now is be home on my couch watching cheesy soap operas, drinking liptons chicken noodle and stuffing kleenex up my nose. Oh man, I wanna go home!!!

Some people are complete and total assholes, it makes me sick...speaking of being sick. I've come to the conclusion that I am dying from some rare and brutal egyptian disease. It's out to get me..i just know it. I bet you right now, there are mutant bugs crawling inside my organs, eating whatever is left of them, by the time I wake up tomorrow, I will be nothing but dust in the wind. OR.....maybe i'm just dreaming, but from now....lets all believe it!!

Hurray for foreign diseases and flesh eating insects!
